Leaftoppm User Manual(0)               Leaftoppm User Manual(0)



Table Of Contents


NAME
       leaftoppm - convert Interleaf image format to PPM image


SYNOPSIS
       leaftoppm [leaffile]


DESCRIPTION
       This program is part of Netpbm(1).

       leaftoppm  reads  a  PPM image as input and generates an
       Interleaf image file as output.

       Interleaf is a now-defunct (actually purchased ca.  2000
       by BroadVision) technical publishing software company.


SEE ALSO
       ppm(1)


AUTHOR
       The program is copyright (C) 1994 by Bill O'Donnell.



netpbm documentation      01 June 2000 Leaftoppm User Manual(0)
